solution_line_template: She wants to serve {glasses_per_guest} glasses of champagne to each of her {num_guests} wedding guests so that's {glasses_per_guest}*{num_guests} = <<{glasses_per_guest}*{num_guests}={total_servings_needed}>>{total_servings_needed} servings

Each bottle holds {servings_per_bottle} servings and she needs {total_servings_needed} servings so that's {total_servings_needed}/{servings_per_bottle} = <<{total_servings_needed}/{servings_per_bottle}={bottles_needed}>>{bottles_needed} bottles of champagne
